adjustments_group: border: none; margin-top: 5px; font-weight: 500; padding: 12px; font-size: 18px;
rotate_button: border: 1px solid #D3D3D3; border-radius: 8px; padding: 8px 16px; color: #555; font-size: 14px;
flip_button: border: 1px solid #D3D3D3; border-radius: 8px; padding: 8px 16px; color: #555; font-size: 14px;
reset_button: border: 1px solid #D3D3D3; border-radius: 8px; padding: 8px 22px; color: #555; font-size: 14px;
nav_button: border: 1px solid #D3D3D3; border-radius: 8px; padding: 8px 16px; color: #555; font-size: 14px;
